mama bagapath una....mata baya hithune mun ekekwath wadi nowunoth some ara oolu palanganama mata kawayi kiyala.....onna kattiyama oolu mal wanjaneyi some ayiyayi dihawe horahin balana gaman eka denna wadi una......some ayiya untath beduwa ara polkatu handen deka gane .....onna kattiyama kanta patan gaththa....mama kokatath kiyala oolu mal poddak bathuth ekka yahamin anala hapala baluwa...happachchiye.....yanthamata gammiris rahak witharayi...wena me loke rahak na....ee madiwata sewala upatha.....waden poren katata gaththu tika hapana gaman horahin baluwa some diha....ma langama indagena innawa bohoma unanduwen mage prathicharaya dana ganta.....ithin wena mak korantada?.....kate thiyana tika waden poren giriyen pallehata yawala hita some ayiya dihata harila lassanata hinauna....''

mema karya sadhanaya pasugiya wasare upayana lada labhaya wu rupiyal miliyana 73 thirasara lesa abibawa yamaki.softlojik wyapara samuhaye mulya sewa anshaye samajikayaku wana eeshiyan elayans rakshana samagama mema kshethraye saha lankiya aarthikaye sadhaniya lakshana matha padanam wemin sanwardhanaya wu paripurna wyaparika upaya margayak matha kriyathmaka wannaki. 2013 mulya warshayata adalawa samagama wisin pennum kala mulya karya sadhanaya mangin samagame wyaparika salasuma ithama wichakshanashiliwa kriyathmaka kala aakaraya pennum kerena athara suwisheshi labhadayithwayak saha sthawara wardhanayak kara gaman kirime mawathata samagama awathirna wi athi bawa da meyin gamya we.pasugiya mulya wasara thula samagama lada dala warika aadayama rupiyal biliyana 4.07 k wu athara eya pasugiya mulya warshaya ha sasandana wita 26% ka wardhanayak pennum karayi.
